ygData.msgSnippet: The TevFifty has a level where a long corridor is lined on both walls with moderate-level towers. It s not a major threat, because anyone can just sit at one

The TevFifty has a level where a long corridor is
lined on both walls with moderate-level towers. It's
not a major threat, because anyone can just sit at one
end of the hall and fire down at the towers. Their
short range makes them sitting ducks : (

  -T.
